entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight then changing to rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
